main.name: Rohan Maheshwari
main.description: Here will be your description. Use this to describe what you do or whatever you feel best describes yourself to a potential employer
main.bio: With 2x Computer Science degrees as a foundation, I've worked on building software systems for IoT, law, healthcare, social media, transport tech, cannabis and restaurant industries and currently work as the lead dev for a blockchain startup, using web development as a vehicle to explore specialized domains. My expertise lies in entrepreneurial web development with a keen interest in contributing to high impact products that need to scale.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.degree: Bachelors with Honors, Magna Cum Laude, Computer Science

work.title: Lead Developer
work.description: Full stack development (PHP, JS) and server management (AWS). Worked closely with the product and executive team to implement business ideas into a scalable investment banking platform. Responsibilities included managing the dev team, overlooking stack and architecture, curation of microservices, plan and execute releases and product updates, design technical products.

work.title: Senior Software Developer
work.description: Lead software developer. Responsible for developing and implementing software architecture for an enterprise level IoT lighting control system in the LAMP Stack with Laravel and Vue.js.

work.title: Full Stack Software Developer
work.description: Part of a small team of developers pushing a software based on Laravel and Vue.js to create APIs, Apps and Web portals that facilitates communication between doctors and Medicare patients. Product Development and UI/UX.

projects.title: Canadian Wanderlust
projects.category: My Travel Blog for my post-university travels

projects.title: Fury Fighting Gear
projects.category: (offline now) A fighting gear company I started

projects.title: Original Thai Food

projects.title: Resume Website

projects.title: Smirkspace
projects.category: (MVP Only) A React and Meteor based chat University project.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
